name: lightnovel crawler
description: Downloads lightnovels from various online sources and generates ebooks in many formats.

LOG_LEVEL.description: Available levels: NOTSET, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, FATAL, ERROR

TELEGRAM_TOKEN.description: Telegram token, only required if BOT is set to telegram

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: Discord token, only required if BOT is set to discord

DISCORD_SIGNAL_CHAR.description: Discord command prefix, only required if BOT is set to discord

GOOGLE_DRIVE_CREDENTIAL_FILE.description: Google Drive service credentials to use

GOOGLE_DRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: Google Drive folder id to upload
